title: Men's 5000 m - Speed Skating St. Moritz 1928 Winter Olympics
table: {"0":{"0":null,"1":"Men's 5000 m 1928","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":null,"6":null,"7":null,"8":"4.","9":"5.","10":"6.","11":"7.","12":"8.","13":"9.","14":"10.","15":"11.","16":"12.","17":"13.","18":"14.","19":"15.","20":"16.","21":"17.","22":"18.","23":"19.","24":"20.","25":"21.","26":"22.","27":"23.","28":"24.","29":"25.","30":"26.","31":"27.","32":"28.","33":"29.","34":"30.","35":"31.","36":"32.","37":null,"38":null,"39":null,"40":"Men's 5000 m - Speed Skating - St. Moritz 1928 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes). Skaters had to change lanes in the back straightaway of each lap in order to skate an equal distance. The skater on the outer lane had the right of way and the skater leaving the inner lane should avoid collision. The Olympic gold medal winner was the athlete with the fastest time for the race. Event facts: Men's 5000 m competition was held at the Badrutts Park and 33 athletes participated in the event.","41":null,"42":"These results for Men's 5000 m - St. Moritz 1928 Winter Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database","43":null},"1":{"0":null,"1":"Men's 5000 m 1928","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":"Ivar Ballangrud","6":"Julius Skutnabb","7":"Bernt Evensen","8":"Irving Jaffee","9":"Armand Carlsen","10":"Valentine Bialas","11":"Michael Staksrud","12":"Otto Polacsek","13":"Gustaf Andersson","14":"Ossi Blomquist","15":"Simon Heiden","16":"Clas Thunberg","17":"Bertel Backmann","18":"Edward Murphy","19":"Alberts Rumba","20":"Friedrich Jungblut","21":"John O'Neil Farrell","22":"Leon Quaglia","23":"Willem Kos","24":"Zoltan E\u00f6tv\u00f6s","25":"Aleksander Mitt","26":"Ross Robinson","27":"Cyril Horn","28":"Christfried Burmeister","29":"Keistutis Bulota","30":"Rudolf Riedl","31":"Fritz Moser","32":"Arthur Vollstedt","33":"William Logan","34":"Charles Thaon","35":"Leonard Stewart","36":"Frederick Dix","37":"Erhard Mayke","38":null,"39":null,"40":"Men's 5000 m - Speed Skating - St. Moritz 1928 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes).
